lines.text: Daddy, will you play with me?
I will play with you later Sol. Now I will play with Hjoerleiurf

[to a statue of Odin]
You gave my father strength. Now you will help Jesus Christ.
I will forgive you when you are dead!
A raven. Odin's raven. He who slays with sword shall by sword fall.

[Licks some blood from an old statue]
Red paint.
I am Leonardo! The great artist!
You see a dead man. Now you will follow him to hell.

I've seen so much. I was taken a thrall by a heathen. He gave me you. Despite all I had to endure... I still miss him, and love him. The God who made the sun has always been my God and heard my prayers. Then one can call him Christ or Odin... Grim is right. Frightened men are dangerous.
Most of us are still heathen. Only christian when necessary.
The father is lying in the heathen temple and the mother is building a church. I don't get it.
